content: **free manta ray knitting pattern - cute & beginner friendly** celebrate a season of love with this sweet and simple free manta ray knitting pattern perfect for beginners this project can be transformed into a keychain a soft toy or a small handmade gift for someone special its gentle curves and charming design make it an ideal cozy craft for valentine s month or any time you want to create something heartfelt **finished size** 8 cm / 3 in **skill level** beginner **techniques** ● long-tail cast on ● increase and decrease stitches ● slip_stitch ● mattress stitch
